name: JTX Fitness
tag_list: vibration-plates, treadmills, cross-trainers, fitness, home-fitness, fitness-equipment
overview:
JTX Fitness specialise in the design and UK distribution of high quality home fitness equipment such as folding treadmills, elliptical cross trainers as well as a wide range of vibration plates. The company is based in Shoreham-by-Sea on the sunny south coast of West Sussex where their head offices also contain a show room offering customers to test and try the equipment before buying.

It all started in 2009 with the first range of vibration plates when power plates™ took the fitness and beauty industry by storm. The company quickly realised that they could design high quality vibration plates at a very competitive price and quickly extended their own product range to include 9 different types at various price points.

In 2011 JTX Fitness started to expand it’s offering by adding treadmills, cross trainers and exercise bikes to their range. Proud of their industry leading attitude to customer service and satisfaction, the company are growing a following of dedicated and loyal customers across the UK.
